TopicTitle: WIP: Full scale (305 meter) TMP Enterprise NCC 1701-A

Articles.Content:
Javascript is disabled. View full album

Heavy work in progress, dimensions are still a bit off and lacks a lot of detail. Saucer has the right diameter. Current part count around 215.

Will have warp drive, photon torpedoes, shuttle bay with shuttle (and maybe even working doors). I'm even considering the turbolift but anyway it will have a way for kerbals to float or walk from one side of the ship to the other.

Anyone who's interested, I'm thinking of making a mod pack with all the config files I made for making this giant possible. Maybe we'll build a fleet some day and meet each other in multiplayer.

How did you....how did..*is geeking because Star Trek*

You know, this would be a great mod for a "You will be assimilated because this is so awesome" quote

To maintain true Kerbalness, it should be resized to 207m long, 98m wide, and maintain the depth of 71.

just sayin.

Other than that...AWSOME!

http://i.imgur.com/pRNnw9U.jpg

Edited May 29, 2014 by Pondafarr

looks great, some pieces seem out of size, like the wing thing holding the engine, seems to narrow, but over all its a great ship, ohh a space shuttle would be sooo nice, so many ships in star trek its amazing, will keep a close eye on this one.

http://www.google.ca/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=images&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&docid=rl8fKlbc5iQAjM&tbnid=Zai4W6keC_p-FM:&ved=0CAUQjRw&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.planetminecraft.com%2Fproject%2Ffully-scaled-and-detailed-starship-enterprise-ncc-1701-a%2F&ei=_aSHU_qlNdCmyASuzIHYCA&bvm=bv.68114441,d.aWw&psig=AFQjCNHsxwBtboVJDxu2_UB1KRjjlwFTAA&ust=1401484518365741

Yeah, I already corrected the neck, the impulse engines, the deflector dish and the general shape of the nacelles. Couldn't find the right dimensions so had to hold a ruler to my screen with the blueprints on.

But I don't want the same detail as in that Minecraft thing. I try to keep part count as low as possible.

Well, now you have that 3-view I posted you can reference The original measurements are on the sheet too.

I shrank that image 47% width-wise to achieve the kerbalness. I had calculated 68% of 305 (305*.68=207) to get the kerbalized length. Then I (207-305)-207*100 to get the conversion 47% for the image size.
Yes, I've collected pretty much every blueprint I could find. It's more the dimensions of the individual parts, can't find those anywhere. But a ruler works.
any more pics of a updated mod? don`t have to worry about being exact, just close to it is ok, will be fun to ride it out, I see there is a shuttle bay, that will be nice
Haven't got the time to work on it at the moment. Have to repair my car in my spare time and one problem is followed by another. Probably at the end of the week will I post an update.

ops, sorry, got to many post open atm. that was for the other enterprise 0o, but a update is nice can`t get enough of star trek ships, there must be millions of ships for star trek, for me textures is the hardest to find, always is a low model poly can be a nice ship with agreat texture, but in ksp It`s kind of restricted with the many mods we go. I`m mod heavy right now, looking for ways to add more, but getting almost impossible, but I will make room for all star trek stuff, can`t wait to see how it looks like later

Anyone who's interested, I'm thinking of making a mod pack with all the config files I made for making this giant possible. Maybe we'll build a fleet some day and meet each other in multiplayer.
